means: 引诱或怂恿（某人）干不正当的事( tempt的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: Wealthy tourists are tempting targets for bag snatchers.
sentence.Network_cn: 富有的游客很容易成为抢包贼的目标。

sentence.Network_en: It is tempting to idealize the past.
sentence.Network_cn: 人都爱把过去的日子说得那么美好。

心理学专业英语词汇(T1) ... tempt 引诱 tempt fate 蔑视命运 temptable 可诱惑的.

entry.def: If something is tempting, it makes you want to do it or have it.

example.ex: In the end, I turned down Raoul's tempting offer of the Palm Beach trip...
example.tran: 最终，我回绝了拉乌尔提出的去棕榈海滩旅行的诱人邀请。

example.ex: If you're slimming, resisting tempting goodies becomes a measure of your 'success' as a woman...
example.tran: 你要是在减肥的话，能否抗拒诱人的美食就成为衡量你作为一个女人是否“成功”的标准。

means.word_mean: 1. highly attractive and able to arouse hope or desire;

sentences.sentence: "difficult to say no to an enticing advertisement"

auth_sentence.content: Instant public noticeboards are useful, amusing and tempting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instant public noticeboards are useful, amusing and tempting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instant public noticeboards are useful, amusing and tempting.

auth_sentence.content: Do not get involved, no matter how tempting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Do not get involved, no matter how tempting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Do not get involved, no matter how tempting.

auth_sentence.content: It looked a little more tempting than Lambeth in September.
auth_sentence.res_content: It looked a little more tempting than Lambeth in September.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It looked a little more tempting than Lambeth in September.

Sentence.sentence: It is tempting to declare the Swedish policies regressive(退步的)and hail the American system as superior.

sentences.en: restaurants tempting us with delicious cakes
sentences.cn: 供应美味诱人蛋糕的餐馆

sentences.en: I made him what I thought were several tempting offers,but he wouldn’t bite.
sentences.cn: 我向他提出一些自以为动听的建议,但他不肯上钩。

sentences.en: You can catch these insects by tempting them to fly into a trap.
sentences.cn: 你可以引诱这些昆虫飞进罗网从而捉住它们。
